summary: When worn this ring summons the 8 Dragon Priest to fight along your side. This effect last until the ring is removed or they are killed in combat. Upon removal the Dragon Priest explode and leave behind a unlootable pile of dust.
descriptionHtml:
When worn this ring summons the 8 Dragon Priest to fight along your side. This effect last until the ring is removed or they are killed in combat. Upon removal the Dragon Priest explode and leave behind a unlootable pile of dust.


To obtain this ring visit any forge, and you will find it under the Jewelry Section, it will require 1 Black Soul Gem(Filled) to craft this godly ring.
author: Imperfections

files.name: Ring of Dragon Priest - more requirements
